site.title: Adastra Labs
site.description: Welcome to Adastra, the premier  web development agency specializing exlusively in clinics and healthcare providers. With proven track record in delivering secure, fast and user-friendly websites we understand the unique needs of your business and your patients. Wether you are a small clinic or a large hospital, we have the right solution for you. let us help you grow your business and reach more patients today!

pricing.subtitle: We offer a variety of packages to suit your needs. From simple websites to full-featured patient portals, we have the right solution for you.
